languages.text: "Служение столь выдающейся персоне было радостью, но долг зовет Коллектив Амарнат к исполнению иной миссии. Весть о переменах должна быть провозглашена. Уверовавшие должны быть отделены от сомневающихся..."

"It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."
languages.original_text: "Служение столь выдающейся персоне было радостью, но долг зовет Коллектив Амарнат к исполнению иной миссии. Весть о переменах должна быть провозглашена. Уверовавшие должны быть отделены от сомневающихся..."

traits.locale_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

"It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

"It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

"It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

"It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

languages.text: “能为这样杰出的人效力，确实令人感到快乐。但出于责任，阿玛纳特聚合意识必须承担其他使命，必须宣布变革已然到来的消息，必须将虔信之人与怀疑之人彻底分开……”
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

traits.locale_text: “能为这样杰出的人效力，确实令人感到快乐。但出于责任，阿玛纳特聚合意识必须承担其他使命，必须宣布变革已然到来的消息，必须将虔信之人与怀疑之人彻底分开……”

languages.text: «Ha sido un placer servir a una persona tan distinguida, pero el deber llama al Colectivo Amarnat a otra misión. Debemos proclamar el mensaje del cambio. Es necesario separar a los creyentes de los escépticos...».
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un placer servir a una persona tan distinguida, pero el deber llama al Colectivo Amarnat a otra misión. Debemos proclamar el mensaje del cambio. Es necesario separar a los creyentes de los escépticos...».

languages.text: 「このような偉大な人物に仕えることができたのは喜ばしいことだが、アマルナト集合体には別の使命が課せられている。変革のメッセージを告げなければならない。信じる者と疑う者を分けるのだ…」
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

traits.locale_text: 「このような偉大な人物に仕えることができたのは喜ばしいことだが、アマルナト集合体には別の使命が課せられている。変革のメッセージを告げなければならない。信じる者と疑う者を分けるのだ…」

languages.text: "Es war eine Freude, einer solch distinguierten Person zu dienen, doch die Pflicht ruft das Amarnat-Kollektiv zu einer anderen Mission. Die Botschaft des Wandels muss verkündet werden. Die Gläubigen müssen von den Zweiflern getrennt werden ..."
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

traits.locale_text: "Es war eine Freude, einer solch distinguierten Person zu dienen, doch die Pflicht ruft das Amarnat-Kollektiv zu einer anderen Mission. Die Botschaft des Wandels muss verkündet werden. Die Gläubigen müssen von den Zweiflern getrennt werden ..."

languages.text: « Ce fut une joie de servir un personnage de votre envergure, mais une mission différente appelle le collectif Amarnat. Le message du changement doit être proclamé. Les croyants doivent être séparés des incrédules... »
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce fut une joie de servir un personnage de votre envergure, mais une mission différente appelle la Collégiale d'Amarnat. Le message du changement doit être proclamé. Les croyants doivent être séparés des incrédules... »

languages.text: "Böylesine özel bir şahsiyete hizmet etmek büyük bir mutluluktu ancak Amarnat Bütünlüğü'ne başka bir görevde ihtiyaç duyuluyor. Değişim mesajı, insanlara duyurulmalı. İnanç sahipleri ile şüphe edenler birbirinden ayrıştırılmalı..."
languages.original_text: "It has been a joy to serve such a distinguished person, but duty calls the Amarnat Collective to a different mission. The message of change must be proclaimed. The believers must be separated from the doubters..."
